item.title: Animated Directional Chord Diagrams
item.description: Background A little while ago my paper in International Migration Review on global migration flow estimates came out online . The paper includes a number of directional chord diagrams to visualize the estimates. Recently I have been playing around tweenr and the magick packages for animated population…
